summary: Immersive player home purchase experience located between Whiterun and Riverwood.
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=3][i][size=4]This stand-alone version of Whitewater Chalet is fun and reliable, but is no longer supported. Whitewater is part of my mod [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/75451/]Qaxe's Questorium[/url][/size][/i][/size][/center][size=3]
[b][color=orange]WHITEWATER CHALET[/color][/b][color=orange][b]: [/b][/color]Affordable, convenient, and private.
-- House purchase dialog with a lore-friendly, unique character
-- Pay 8k, buy upgrades and move in -- no lengthy quests involved
-- Home furnishing options (starts unfurnished)
-- Option to hire a housekeeper to help you buy much needed supplies
-- Options to hire experts to come guard your home, teach you their skills, or travel with you
-- Hirelings have their own rooms, beds, chests and schedules. Hirelings have horses.
-- Horse purchase option for player (2 follower horses included)
-- Underground passage with option to connect with your home
-- "Teleport Whitewater" lets you teleport home from anywhere in Tamriel
-- All crafting stations, bookshelves, weapons racks and mannequins available.
-- Safe storage inside and outside the house
-- Bridge access for people who prefer walking
-- Scenic location between Whiterun and Riverwood

[color=orange]NOTES: [/color]
-- Total cost: 15,000 septims (or so). House (8000), all furnishings (5200), all hirelings (1900) and horse (400)
-- Updateing? Remove old version and play the game once without it before installing new version.
-- Technical trouble? Check the README.
-- Only containers in the house and outside are safe. Tunnel section and exterior will re-spawn.
-- Followers are NOT immortal.
-- All purchases enable furnishings/npc the same way the standard game does. There is no waiting period.
-- I will not add assets from other mods such as paintings, fish tanks, etc.

[color=orange]INSTALLATION[/color] I suggest using Mod Organizer to install mods over Nexus Mod Manager. M.O. installation is not just faster, but safer when removing mods.

[color=orange]CONFLICTS [/color]with any mod that occupies the same location. Click the "Images" tab to see the location on the map.Do not use with "Qaxe's Questorium". Whitewater is now part of QQ.

[color=orange]CRAVE MORE ADVENTURE? [/color] [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/75451/]Qaxe Questorium[/url] is my "main" mod. It contains over 1Gb of towns, quests, dungeons, spells, voiced followers, and...pretty much anything I could possibly cram into my 9 unique world spaces. This mod is part of Qaxe's Questorium, so don't use them together.

[color=orange]SUPPORT:[/color] Qaxe's Whitewater Falls moved to my [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/75451/]Qaxe Questorium[/url] mod in May, 2016. This stand-alone version is [i]no longer supported.[/i]

[color=orange]PERMISSIONS:[/color][b] [/b]This mod is the creative property of the author. The author does NOT give permission for re-uploading this mod, edits/renditions/merges of this mod on this or any other website(s). Translations and patches may not contain my files. If you see this mod anywhere but but here please report it.
[/size]
author: Qaxe Qaixaci

files.name: Whitewater Falls v16
files.changelogHtml:
-- FIX: All purchases require gold. (Lack of sufficient coin will prevent purchase option to appear)
-- FIX: couple of food items marked as incorrect ownership
-- FIX: Lamp posts on bridge swung to side to better accommodate crossing on horseback
-- Dirty, filthy, skeever-ridden, thrice-damned, wild edits and ITM removed
